trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.ControlType.Document" /> control types to UI Automation.
The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer> represents documents and supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
Objects such as a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> can contain embedded objects, such as images and hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 와 같은 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> 이미지, 하이퍼링크 등의 포함 된 개체를 포함할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initially, when you try to get the child elements of the document, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> does not return the embedded objects.
trans-unit.target: 처음에 하려고 하면 자식 요소는 문서를 가져올 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 포함 된 개체를 반환 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: To get the embedded elements, obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> and call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 포함된 된 요소를 가져오려면 가져올는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> 에서 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called, any elements in that <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> are returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 후 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 를 호출 하는의 요소가 하나라도 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> 반환한 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Unless you know the document is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, you should not call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 문서를 확신할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>를 호출 하지 않아야 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the document is loaded from a network location, calling <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> on the entire document is resource intensive.
trans-unit.target: 문서는 네트워크 위치에서 로드 되 면 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> 문서 전체에 리소스가 아니며 많아질 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should use one of the methods on <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> that returns a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> that represents a portion of the document.
trans-unit.target: 메서드 중 하나를 사용 해야는 대신, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> 반환 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> 문서의 일부를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> class.
Gets the control type for the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />와 연결된 컨트롤의 컨트롤 형식을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
<see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Text" /> in all cases.

Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the screen coordinates of the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />에 연결된 요소의 화면 좌표를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.
The bounding rectangle.

Gets the collection of child elements for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />의 자식 요소 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

Because <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> gives access to its content through <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern" />, this method always returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />을 통해 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern" />의 콘텐츠에 액세스할 수 있으므로 이 메서드는 항상 <see langword="null" />을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
A string that contains "Document".

Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that represents the clickable space that is on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />와 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />의 클릭 가능한 공간을 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" />.
The point that represents the clickable space that is on the element.
trans-unit.target: 요소에 있는 클릭 가능한 공간을 나타내는 지점입니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.

If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Text" />, this method returns an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider" />.

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> is understood by the end user as interactive or the user might understand the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />가 최종 사용자에게 대화형으로 인식되는지 또는 사용자에게 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />가 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)]에 있는 컨트롤에 대한 논리 구조에 참여하는 것으로 인식되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.
<see langword="true" /> in all cases.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />에 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />가 화면에서 벗어났는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 요소가 화면에 없으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 요소의 표시 여부를 나타내지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: 일부 경우에는 요소는 화면에 지만 표시 되어 있지 않으면입니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 다른 요소에 의해 가려진 요소는 표시 되지 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method returns `false`.
